scripts.copy-admin: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['admin.html', 'admin-tickets.html', 'admin-announcements.html', 'admin-dashboard.html', 'admin-profile.html']; files.forEach(file => { fs.copyFileSync(file, 'dist/' + file, fs.constants.COPYFILE_FSYNC); }); console.log('Admin files copied to dist/');"
scripts.build-with-admin: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-admin
